item.title: Bar Conversations
item.description:
Bar conversations.

What script are you sticking too? Do you tell the same story a different way or create new ones? Are you even at a bar? To yourself or to others.. what does it… who cares. Telling or lying to yourself or others. A natural detox. Awareness of the ability to choose. How loud are your thoughts inside your own head?

Thank you Mother Earth and the tears of her father.

item.title: Be Who
item.description:
Mediate with thought.

Remember your breathing.

Without listening,

constantly hearing.

Brain fighting the devil,

constantly feeling.

Add those all up,

Agh so appealing.

Be who you are when you speak

Be who you are when you move

Be LOVE and you will find your groove.

The ocean can be purple

And orange can be black

Another lap around, that square race track.

Swimming in bliss with my mouth above water.

item.title: IF God is An Artist
item.description:
If God is the Artist

The earth must be his easel.

If God is the Artist,

Where does that leave his people?

If God is the Artist,

Does he wish upon a star?

If God is the Artist,

Does he play guitar?

If God is the Artist,

He must need something to play.

If God is the Artist,

What does he say?

If God is the Artist,

That must make people the strings.

item.title: Im Just Here
item.description:
Surrounded by the wrong folk,

Dann how phenomenal.

Struck in traffic mentally.

Stuck in the same place indefinitely.

It’s easy to be stuck,

When your glue is that sticky.

Agh, isn’t the truth so sticky.

Mentally centred.

Love is my adhesive.

Skin it next, the meat of it ceases.

item.title: letters
item.description:
Letters of conversation

Sings a lullaby

Why do our chants make you cry

Sentences are no more than prayers while you’re awake.

What’s the mistake?

We’re both in love with the snake.

Both hold the keys at the start of the gate

What’s a mistake?

Get in, don’t be late

Rc

item.title: Reinforce You
item.description:
If provoked.

The “Loser” will always follow the hero. The answers exist in the mind of the misguided. That; if focused on, turns them into a “hero”

Being that these issues exist in a pool of thoughts that are “real” to you, affects the reason why you don’t dive in head first. Because of fear of the unknown being there.

Where you’re unsure you can produce the outcome you need/desire. Deep in that pool; exists tools that are able to reinforce you.

item.title: Sail Away
item.description:
Sail away forward lover

We both have much to discover

The peace found, sails away now.

Carry on, kind of eyes above ground.

Lay your angry mind to rest.

Leave it to me to pass the test.

Come sail away, the wind is in our sail.

Our rudder will help us prevail.

Bonding soul in the mast,

We already moved past.

Clowns and jesters

Kings and queens

What does it all mean?

item.title: Smiles And Cries
item.description:
Todays reasons why

Mixed in with yesterdays cries

Choose to fly

Choose to sigh

My oh my

The last laugh

Is a fist bump with a tight grasp

Do you know your “I”?

Are you aware or your smiles and cries.

When do you let it die.

What do you see in the clouds

How high do you get when you’re down.

Dimensions of thought bleeds into the doors of perception.

item.title: Playground
item.description:
The Playground
Where one races to a red light,
The other races to a slide.
Where one must be on time,
The other pays no mind.
Where one clocks in,
The other clocks out.
Where one sits down,
The other jumps around.
Where one sees green,
The other sees shades.
Where one gets no rest,
The other one plays.
Where one must click a mouse,
The other is outside, in his own house.
Where one values financial security,
The other has a grasp of the imaginary.
Where one attracts stress,
The other lay awake in the beautiful mess.
Where one must depend on the ego,
The other doesn’t know why, but they must go.
Where ones boss is the time on the clock,
The other sees his ship, parked at the dock.
Where one sees a long day,
The other is has everything to say.
Where one races back to his place in bed.
The other dances with dragons inside of his head.
Where one wakes up and says “here we go again”
The other volunteers to play instead.
Where one doesn’t believe the words they say.
The other is not affected by the day.
Where one waits a few extra seconds to move.
The other one has nothing to prove.

item.title: Magicman
item.description:
There once was a magic man.
Touched souls across the land.
Lies? No, I saw it first hand.
I was one of the lucky ones.
He was there when I begun.
Not blood but brothers in arms.
Spectators of the animal farm.
The magic man sat down on his bike, agh I can hear it now.
Started that thing up to a thunderous sound.
There was magic in this, with foam in his Guinness. I was there, believe this.
The magic man spoke and the magic man would gesture.
“Take it easy” was the lecture.
Valedictorian of the school of hard knocks.
Back down and give up? The magic man would not.
Fire and rain, the magic man was no stranger to pain.

item.title: Floyd
item.description:
Floyd said it’s like two lost souls swimming in a fish bowl.
Year after year that was my soul.

Until that bowl transformed into an hour glass,
You can’t count on moments that passed.
In the past?

We all need a tree like the giving one.
At the end we stop where we begun.

Just thanks to breath and the vibrations around.
Open your eyes and taste the sound.

We live together and die alone.
Magic measuring tape and traffic cones.

item.title: The saga of the trees
item.description:
Where one stands
One also falls
Chopped down
The roots remain.
Does it stay the same when it grows back?
What is the it?
What is it?
Does the wind hit it different now?
What is it?
What about the colors and what does the shade smell like?
Sticks and stones at my base.
Come take a seat.

item.description:
